title: Typical player behaviour and whats wrong with this game
body:
Hello friends,

Now I just wanted to show you,what SOME players are like and how to easily avoid getting banned.

This guy (too bad I cant name him),trolled in one of my games like a week ago.Took Trundle support,bought no support items OR any wards and worst of all,he kept using his E to,either cancel our skillshots or just simply cancel our movement so enemies could easily get us.
He didnt ask any of us in our team if we could play support for him.He didnt show any signs of trollage in champ select screen at all.I mean Trundle support is a decent pick if you know what are you doing.

After the match I reported him for intentional feeding and trolling and out of curiosity added him to friends list to see if he will get banned at all.Even wrote a ticket to Riot Support.

And after a week or so,he had this to say - look at the picture.

What do you guys think about people like that?Curious is all.I mean,he WAS trolling and as far as I know,for Riot its hard to say if it was intentional or not.I think community should be more involved when solving cases of intentional trollism.Hell,let the most honorable players sit down watch replays and ban trolls,and reward them for a job well done.
